verses.verse: Ye <S%H859><s%> are the children <S%H1121><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God: <S%H430><s%> ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> cut yourselves, <S%H1413><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> make <S%H7760><s%> any baldness <S%H7144><s%> between <S%H996><s%> your eyes <S%H5869><s%> for the dead. <S%H4191><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art a holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath chosen <S%H977><s%> thee to be <S%H1961><s%> a peculiar <S%H5459><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> unto himself, above all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> the nations <S%H5971><s%> that <S%H834><s%> are upon <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the earth. <S%H127><s%>
Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> abominable thing. <S%H8441><s%>
These <S%H2063><s%> are the beasts <S%H929><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye shall eat: <S%H398><s%> the ox, <S%H7794><s%> the sheep, <S%H7716><s%> <S%H3775><s%> and the goat, <S%H7716><s%> <S%H5795><s%>

The hart, <S%H354><s%> and the roebuck, <S%H6643><s%> and the fallow deer, <S%H3180><s%> and the wild goat, <S%H689><s%> and the pygarg, <S%H1788><s%> and the wild ox, <S%H8377><s%> and the chamois. <S%H2169><s%>

And every <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H929><s%> that parteth <S%H6536><s%> the hoof, <S%H6541><s%> and cleaveth <S%H8156><s%> the cleft <S%H8157><s%> into two <S%H8147><s%> claws, <S%H6541><s%> and cheweth <S%H5927><s%> the cud <S%H1625><s%> among the beasts, <S%H929><s%> that ye shall eat. <S%H398><s%>

Nevertheless <S%H389><s%> <S%H853><s%> these <S%H2088><s%> ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> of them that chew <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5927><s%> the cud, <S%H1625><s%> or of them that divide <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6536><s%> the cloven <S%H8156><s%> hoof; <S%H6541><s%> as <S%H853><s%> the camel, <S%H1581><s%> and the hare, <S%H768><s%> and the coney: <S%H8227><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> chew <S%H5927><s%> the cud, <S%H1625><s%> but divide <S%H6536><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> the hoof; <S%H6541><s%> therefore they <S%H1992><s%> are unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you.

And the swine, <S%H2386><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> divideth <S%H6536><s%> the hoof, <S%H6541><s%> yet cheweth not <S%H3808><s%> the cud, <S%H1625><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you: ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> of their flesh, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1320><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> touch <S%H5060><s%> their dead carcass. <S%H5038><s%>

<S%H853><s%> These <S%H2088><s%> ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> are in the waters: <S%H4325><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> have fins <S%H5579><s%> and scales <S%H7193><s%> shall ye eat: <S%H398><s%>

And whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> hath not <S%H369><s%> fins <S%H5579><s%> and scales <S%H7193><s%> ye may not <S%H3808><s%> eat; <S%H398><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you.
Of all <S%H3605><s%> clean <S%H2889><s%> birds <S%H6833><s%> ye shall eat. <S%H398><s%>
But these <S%H2088><s%> are they of which <S%H834><s%> ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> eat: <S%H398><s%> the eagle, <S%H5404><s%> and the ossifrage, <S%H6538><s%> and the osprey, <S%H5822><s%>
And the glede, <S%H7201><s%> and the kite, <S%H344><s%> and the vulture <S%H1772><s%> after his kind, <S%H4327><s%>
And every <S%H3605><s%> raven <S%H6158><s%> after his kind, <S%H4327><s%>
And the owl, <S%H1323><s%> <S%H3284><s%> and the night hawk, <S%H8464><s%> and the cuckoo, <S%H7828><s%> and the hawk <S%H5322><s%> after his kind, <S%H4327><s%>
<S%H853><s%> The little owl, <S%H3563><s%> and the great owl, <S%H3244><s%> and the swan, <S%H8580><s%>
And the pelican, <S%H6893><s%> and the gier-eagle, <S%H7360><s%> and the cormorant, <S%H7994><s%>
And the stork, <S%H2624><s%> and the heron <S%H601><s%> after her kind, <S%H4327><s%> and the lapwing, <S%H1744><s%> and the bat. <S%H5847><s%>
And every <S%H3605><s%> creeping thing <S%H8318><s%> that flieth <S%H5775><s%> is unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you: they shall not <S%H3808><s%> be eaten. <S%H398><s%>
But of all <S%H3605><s%> clean <S%H2889><s%> fowls <S%H5775><s%> ye may eat. <S%H398><s%>

Ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> of any <S%H3605><s%> thing that dieth of itself: <S%H5038><s%> thou shalt give <S%H5414><s%> it unto the stranger <S%H1616><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is in thy gates, <S%H8179><s%> that he may eat <S%H398><s%> it; or <S%H176><s%> thou mayest sell <S%H4376><s%> it unto an alien: <S%H5237><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art a holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God. <S%H430><s%> Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> seethe <S%H1310><s%> a kid <S%H1423><s%> in his mother's <S%H517><s%> milk. <S%H2461><s%>

Thou shalt truly tithe <S%H6237><s%> <S%H6237><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the increase <S%H8393><s%> of thy seed, <S%H2233><s%> that the field <S%H7704><s%> bringeth forth <S%H3318><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> by year. <S%H8141><s%>

And thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he shall choose <S%H977><s%> to place <S%H7931><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> the tithe <S%H4643><s%> of thy corn, <S%H1715><s%> of thy wine, <S%H8492><s%> and of thine oil, <S%H3323><s%> and the firstlings <S%H1062><s%> of thy herds <S%H1241><s%> and of thy flocks; <S%H6629><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> thou mayest learn <S%H3925><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> always. <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%>

And if <S%H3588><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> be too long <S%H7235><s%> for <S%H4480><s%> thee, so that <S%H3588><s%> thou art not able <S%H3201><s%> <S%H3808><s%> to carry <S%H5375><s%> it; or if <S%H3588><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> be too far <S%H7368><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> thee, which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%> to set <S%H7760><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath blessed <S%H1288><s%> thee:

Then shalt thou turn <S%H5414><s%> it into money, <S%H3701><s%> and bind up <S%H6696><s%> the money <S%H3701><s%> in thine hand, <S%H3027><s%> and shalt go <S%H1980><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall choose: <S%H977><s%>

And thou shalt bestow <S%H5414><s%> that money <S%H3701><s%> for whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> thy soul <S%H5315><s%> lusteth after, <S%H183><s%> for oxen, <S%H1241><s%> or for sheep, <S%H6629><s%> or for wine, <S%H3196><s%> or for strong drink, <S%H7941><s%> or for whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> thy soul <S%H5315><s%> desireth: <S%H7592><s%> and thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> and thou shalt rejoice, <S%H8055><s%> thou, <S%H859><s%> and thine household, <S%H1004><s%>

And the Levite <S%H3881><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is within thy gates; <S%H8179><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> him; for <S%H3588><s%> he hath no <S%H369><s%> part <S%H2506><s%> nor inheritance <S%H5159><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee.

At the end <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7097><s%> of three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> thou shalt bring forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the tithe <S%H4643><s%> of thine increase <S%H8393><s%> the same <S%H1931><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> and shalt lay it up <S%H5117><s%> within thy gates: <S%H8179><s%>

And the Levite, <S%H3881><s%> (because <S%H3588><s%> he hath no <S%H369><s%> part <S%H2506><s%> nor inheritance <S%H5159><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee,) and the stranger, <S%H1616><s%> and the fatherless, <S%H3490><s%> and the widow, <S%H490><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are within thy gates, <S%H8179><s%> shall come, <S%H935><s%> and shall eat <S%H398><s%> and be satisfied; <S%H7646><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> may bless <S%H1288><s%> thee in all <S%H3605><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of thine hand <S%H3027><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou doest. <S%H6213><s%>
